meanings.definition: A small building, typically separate from a main house, used as a toilet.
meanings.sent1: The outhouses in the park were clean and well-maintained.
meanings.sent2: People in the countryside often have outhouses in their backyard.
meanings.sent3: The outhouses at the campsite had funny signs on their doors.
meanings.sent4: The rows of outhouses stood like tiny sentinels in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The smell from the outhouses lingered in the air, reminding us of their purpose.
